languages.text: "Авторужья?!" {n}Лицо блюстителя покрывается багровыми пятнами.{/n} "Варп меня побери, чтобы обойти охрану оружейного состава и вынести груз, нужно содействие кого-то из блюстителей. Недавно я казнил одного ублюдка, который сбывал оружие — но даже он не был настолько жаден и туп, чтобы снабжать чернь авторужьями. Значит, в отсеке есть еще сволочь, пятнающая мундир. Я найду гада и суну его башку под поезд".

traits.locale_text: "Авторужья?!" {n}Лицо блюстителя покрывается багровыми пятнами.{/n} "Варп меня побери, чтобы обойти охрану оружейного состава и вынести груз, нужно содействие кого-то из блюстителей. Недавно я казнил одного ублюдка, который сбывал оружие — но даже он не был настолько жаден и туп, чтобы снабжать чернь авторужьями. Значит, в отсеке есть еще сволочь, пятнающая мундир. Я найду гада и суну его башку под поезд".

languages.text: "Autoguns?" {n}Purple spots appear on his face.{/n} "Warp take me, they couldn't have bypassed the security of a munitions train and walked away with the cargo without help from someone in the enforcers. I executed one reprobate who was trafficking in weapons not too long ago, but even that moron wasn't so greedy and stupid as to arm the rabble with autoguns. So there is another who dishonours the enforcers' uniform. I will find the maggot and shove their head under a passing train."
languages.original_text: "Авторужья?!" {n}Лицо блюстителя покрывается багровыми пятнами.{/n} "Варп меня побери, чтобы обойти охрану оружейного состава и вынести груз, нужно содействие кого-то из блюстителей. Недавно я казнил одного ублюдка, который сбывал оружие — но даже он не был настолько жаден и туп, чтобы снабжать чернь авторужьями. Значит, в отсеке есть еще сволочь, пятнающая мундир. Я найду гада и суну его башку под поезд".

traits.locale_text: "Autoguns?" {n}Purple spots appear on his face.{/n} "Warp take me, they couldn't have bypassed the security of a munitions train and walked away with the cargo without help from someone in the enforcers. I executed one reprobate who was trafficking in weapons not too long ago, but even that moron wasn't so greedy and stupid as to arm the rabble with autoguns. So there is another who dishonours the enforcers' uniform. I will find the maggot and shove their head under a passing train."

"I... What?" {n}The captain's face goes ashen. He stumbles through his words.{/n} "Lord Captain, {mf|sir|ma'am}, my enforcers have investigated an insurgent cell, there was questioning and surveillance of suspects. But... machine guns? Who would dare rob a munitions train? Only someone we wouldn't suspect." {n}Eddock Frensoe scowls menacingly.{/n} "I swear I'll sweep every bloody corner of these tunnels and bring the perpetrators to justice!"

"Autoguns?" {n}Purple spots appear on his face.{/n} "Warp take me, they couldn't have bypassed the security of a munitions train and walked away with the cargo without help from someone in the enforcers. I executed one reprobate who was trafficking in weapons not too long ago, but even that moron wasn't so greedy and stupid as to arm the rabble with autoguns. So there is another who dishonours the enforcers' uniform. I will find the maggot and shove their head under a passing train."

"I... What?" {n}The blood drains from the captain's face, and he stumbles over his words.{/n} "Lord Captain, {mf|sir|ma'am}, my enforcers did investigate an insurgent cell recently. The suspects were questioned and placed under surveillance. But... machine guns? Who would dare rob a munitions train? Only someone we would never suspect." {n}He scowls menacingly.{/n} "I swear I'll sweep every bloody corner of these tunnels and bring the perpetrators to justice!"

"Autoguns?" {n}Purple spots appear on his face.{/n} "Warp take me, they couldn't have bypassed the security of a munitions train and walked away with the cargo without help from someone in the enforcers. I executed one reprobate who was trafficking in weapons not too long ago, but even that moron wasn't so greedy and stupid as to arm the rabble with autoguns. So there is another who dishonours the enforcers' uniform. I will find the maggot and shove their head under a passing train."

"Autoguns?" {n}Purple spots appear on his face.{/n} "Warp take me, they couldn't have bypassed the security of a munitions train and walked away with the cargo without help from someone in the enforcers. I executed one reprobate who was trafficking in weapons not too long ago, but even that moron wasn't so greedy and stupid as to arm the rabble with autoguns. So there is another who dishonours the enforcers' uniform. I will find the maggot and shove their head under a passing train."

"I... What?" {n}The blood drains from the captain's face, and he stumbles over his words.{/n} "Lord Captain, {mf|sir|ma'am}, my enforcers did investigate an insurgent cell recently. The suspects were questioned and placed under surveillance. But... autoguns? Who would dare rob a munitions train?" {n}He scowls menacingly.{/n} "I swear, I'll sweep every bloody corner of these tunnels, and I won't stop until all who have neglected their duty and allowed this outrageous crime to take place have been brought to justice!"

"Autoguns?" {n}Purple spots appear on his face.{/n} "Warp take me, they couldn't have bypassed the security of a munitions train and walked away with the cargo without help from someone in the enforcers. I executed one reprobate who was trafficking in weapons not too long ago, but even that moron wasn't so greedy and stupid as to arm the rabble with autoguns. So there is another who dishonours the enforcers' uniform. I will find the maggot and shove their head under a passing train."

"Autoguns?" {n}Purple spots appear on his face.{/n} "Warp take me, they couldn't have bypassed the security of a munitions train and walked away with the cargo without help from someone in the enforcers. I executed one reprobate who was trafficking in weapons not too long ago, but even that moron wasn't so greedy and stupid as to arm the rabble with autoguns. So there is another who dishonours the enforcers' uniform. I will find the maggot and shove their head under a passing train."

languages.text: «¿Rifles automáticos?». {n}Su rostro se ruboriza.{/n} «Que la disformidad me lleve si han sido capaces de saltarse las medidas de seguridad de un tren de armamento y llevarse el cargamento sin la ayuda de algún guardia. No hace mucho ejecuté a un traidor que traficaba con armas, pero ni siquiera aquel cretino era tan avaricioso y estúpido como para armar a la plebe con rifles automáticos. Así que debe de haber otro que está deshonrando el uniforme. ¡Encontraré a esa alimaña y le ataré la cabeza a la vía del tren!».
languages.original_text: "Autoguns?" {n}Purple spots appear on his face.{/n} "Warp take me, they couldn't have bypassed the security of a munitions train and walked away with the cargo without help from someone in the enforcers. I executed one reprobate who was trafficking in weapons not too long ago, but even that moron wasn't so greedy and stupid as to arm the rabble with autoguns. So there is another who dishonours the enforcers' uniform. I will find the maggot and shove their head under a passing train."

traits.locale_text: «¿Rifles automáticos?». {n}Su rostro se ruboriza.{/n} «Que la disformidad me lleve si han sido capaces de saltarse las medidas de seguridad de un tren de armamento y llevarse el cargamento sin la ayuda de algún guardia. No hace mucho ejecuté a un traidor que traficaba con armas, pero ni siquiera aquel cretino era tan avaricioso y estúpido como para armar a la plebe con rifles automáticos. Así que debe de haber otro que está deshonrando el uniforme. ¡Encontraré a esa alimaña y le ataré la cabeza a la vía del tren!».

languages.text: 「オートガンですか？」{n}紫色の染みがその顔に浮かぶ。{/n}「<歪み>め。連中が軍需品列車の警備の裏をかいて貨物を持ち去るなど、エンフォーサーの助けなしにできたはずはありません。先日、武器の密売をしていた不届き者を一人処刑しましたが、その愚か者でさえ、オートガンで民衆を武装させるほど貪欲で愚かではありませんでした。つまり、エンフォーサーの制服を汚す者がまた一人いるわけですか。我はその蛆虫を見つけて、通り過ぎる列車の下に頭を突っ込んでやりましょう」
languages.original_text: "Autoguns?" {n}Purple spots appear on his face.{/n} "Warp take me, they couldn't have bypassed the security of a munitions train and walked away with the cargo without help from someone in the enforcers. I executed one reprobate who was trafficking in weapons not too long ago, but even that moron wasn't so greedy and stupid as to arm the rabble with autoguns. So there is another who dishonours the enforcers' uniform. I will find the maggot and shove their head under a passing train."

traits.locale_text: 「オートガンですか？」{n}紫色の染みがその顔に浮かぶ。{/n}「<歪み>め。連中が軍需品列車の警備の裏をかいて貨物を持ち去るなど、エンフォーサーの助けなしにできたはずはありません。先日、武器の密売をしていた不届き者を一人処刑しましたが、その愚か者でさえ、オートガンで民衆を武装させるほど貪欲で愚かではありませんでした。つまり、エンフォーサーの制服を汚す者がまた一人いるわけですか。我はその蛆虫を見つけて、通り過ぎる列車の下に頭を突っ込んでやりましょう」

languages.text: “自动枪？”{n}他的脸上泛起了紫红色的斑点。{/n}“那群王八蛋，要是执法者里没有他们的内鬼，他们绝对不可能躲开军火货车的安全检查，更别提带着货物逃跑。不久前，我刚刚处决了一个走私武器的人渣，但就算是那个白痴，也没有蠢到把自动枪卖给底层的渣滓。也就是说，我们之中有个败类。我一定会找到那条蛆虫，把他的脑袋按到火车轮子下面。”
languages.original_text: "Autoguns?" {n}Purple spots appear on his face.{/n} "Warp take me, they couldn't have bypassed the security of a munitions train and walked away with the cargo without help from someone in the enforcers. I executed one reprobate who was trafficking in weapons not too long ago, but even that moron wasn't so greedy and stupid as to arm the rabble with autoguns. So there is another who dishonours the enforcers' uniform. I will find the maggot and shove their head under a passing train."

traits.locale_text: “自动枪？”{n}他的脸上泛起了紫红色的斑点。{/n}“那群王八蛋，要是执法者里没有他们的内鬼，他们绝对不可能躲开军火货车的安全检查，更别提带着货物逃跑。不久前，我刚刚处决了一个走私武器的人渣，但就算是那个白痴，也没有蠢到把自动枪卖给底层的渣滓。也就是说，我们之中有个败类。我一定会找到那条蛆虫，把他的脑袋按到火车轮子下面。”

languages.text: "Sturmgewehre?" {n}Auf seinem Gesicht erscheinen violette Punkte.{/n} "Der Warp soll mich holen, sie hätten ohne Hilfe aus den Reihen der Enforcer niemals die Security eines Munitionszuges umgehen und mit der Fracht entkommen können. Ich habe vor nicht allzu langer Zeit einen Halunken exekutiert, der mit Waffen gehandelt hat, aber selbst dieser Hornochse war nicht so blöd oder gierig, das Gesindel mit Sturmgewehren zu versorgen. Es gibt also noch jemanden, der die Uniform der Enforcer entehrt. Ich werde diese Made finden und von einem fahrenden Zug enthaupten lassen."
languages.original_text: "Autoguns?" {n}Purple spots appear on his face.{/n} "Warp take me, they couldn't have bypassed the security of a munitions train and walked away with the cargo without help from someone in the enforcers. I executed one reprobate who was trafficking in weapons not too long ago, but even that moron wasn't so greedy and stupid as to arm the rabble with autoguns. So there is another who dishonours the enforcers' uniform. I will find the maggot and shove their head under a passing train."

traits.locale_text: "Sturmgewehre?" {n}Auf seinem Gesicht erscheinen violette Punkte.{/n} "Der Warp soll mich holen, sie hätten ohne Hilfe aus den Reihen der Enforcer niemals die Security eines Munitionszuges umgehen und mit der Fracht entkommen können. Ich habe vor nicht allzu langer Zeit einen Halunken exekutiert, der mit Waffen gehandelt hat, aber selbst dieser Hornochse war nicht so blöd oder gierig, das Gesindel mit Sturmgewehren zu versorgen. Es gibt also noch jemanden, der die Uniform der Enforcer entehrt. Ich werde diese Made finden und von einem fahrenden Zug enthaupten lassen."

languages.text: « Des fusils d'assaut ? {n}Des taches pourpres apparaissent sur son visage.{/n} Le Warp m'emporte, ils n'ont pas pu forcer le système de sécurité d'un train de munitions et filer avec la cargaison sans l'aide d'un agent double infiltré parmi les prévôts. J'ai récemment fait exécuter un malfrat qui se livrait au trafic d'armes, mais même cet abruti n'était pas assez cupide pour armer la populace de fusils d'assaut. Autrement dit, il y a parmi nous un autre traître qui déshonore l'uniforme des prévôts. Je trouverai ce sale cafard et je le jetterai personnellement sous un train. »
languages.original_text: "Autoguns?" {n}Purple spots appear on his face.{/n} "Warp take me, they couldn't have bypassed the security of a munitions train and walked away with the cargo without help from someone in the enforcers. I executed one reprobate who was trafficking in weapons not too long ago, but even that moron wasn't so greedy and stupid as to arm the rabble with autoguns. So there is another who dishonours the enforcers' uniform. I will find the maggot and shove their head under a passing train."

traits.locale_text: « Des fusils d'assaut ? {n}Des taches pourpres apparaissent sur son visage.{/n} Le Warp m'emporte, ils n'ont pas pu forcer le système de sécurité d'un train de munitions et filer avec la cargaison sans l'aide d'un agent double infiltré parmi les prévôts. J'ai récemment fait exécuter un malfrat qui se livrait au trafic d'armes, mais même cet abruti n'était pas assez cupide pour armer la populace de fusils d'assaut. Autrement dit, il y a parmi nous un autre traître qui déshonore l'uniforme des prévôts. Je trouverai ce sale cafard et je le jetterai personnellement sous un train. »

languages.text: "Ototüfek mi?" {n}Yüzünde mor benekler ortaya çıkıyor.{/n} "Uçsuz alsın beni, infazcılar arasından birinin yardımı olmadan cephane treninin güvenliğini aşıp kargoyla uzaklaşmış olamazlar. Kısa süre önce silah kaçakçılığı yapan bir namussuzu infaz ettim ama o mankafa bile ayaktakımının eline ototüfek verecek kadar açgözlü ve salak değildi. Demek ki infazcı üniformasına leke süren birisi daha var. O şerefsizi bulup kafasını ilk geçen trenin altına sokacağım."
languages.original_text: "Autoguns?" {n}Purple spots appear on his face.{/n} "Warp take me, they couldn't have bypassed the security of a munitions train and walked away with the cargo without help from someone in the enforcers. I executed one reprobate who was trafficking in weapons not too long ago, but even that moron wasn't so greedy and stupid as to arm the rabble with autoguns. So there is another who dishonours the enforcers' uniform. I will find the maggot and shove their head under a passing train."
